text:
It is derived from the sentence wa tartt kullu ummat- in jathiyat-un of verse 28, implying thereby that it is the Surah in which the word jathiyah has occurred.

Period of Revelation

The period of the revelation of this Surah also has not been mentioned in any authentic tradition, but its subject matter clearly shows that it was revealed consecutively after Surah Ad Dukhan. The close resemblance between the contents of the two Surahs makes them look like the twin Surahs.

Subject Matter and Topics

It answers the doubts and objections of the disbelievers of Makkah about Tauhid and the Hereafter and warns them for their attitude that they had adopted against the message of the Qur'an.

The discourse begins with the arguments for Tauhid. In this connection, reference has been made to the count- less Signs that are found in the world, from man's own body to the earth and heavens, and it is pointed out that everywhere around him man finds things which testify to Tauhid which he refuses to acknowledge. If man sees carefully the variety of animals, the day and night, the rainfall and the vegetation thereby, the winds and his own creation, and ponders over them intelligently, without prejudice, he will find these Signs sufficiently convincing of the truth that this universe is not Godless, nor under the control of many gods, but it has been created by One God, and He alone is its Controller and Ruler. However, the case of the person who is determined not to acknowledge and wants to remain involved in doubts and suspicions is different. He cannot be blessed with the faith and conviction from anywhere in the world.

A little below, in the beginning of the second section, it has been reiterated that the things man is exploiting in the world, and the countless forces and agencies that are serving his interests in the universe, did not come into being just accidentally, nor have they been provided by the gods and goddesses, but it is One God alone, Who has supplied and subjected these to him from Himself. If only a person uses his mind properly and rightly, his own intellect will proclaim that God alone is man's real Benefactor and He alone deserves that man should pay obeisance to Him.

After this, the disbelievers of Makkah have been taken to task and reproved for their stubbornness, arrogance, mockery and insistence on disbelief with which they were resisting the invitation of the Qur'an they have been warned that this Qur'an has brought the same blessing which had been granted to the children of Israel before, by virtue of which they became distinguished above all the people of the world. Then, when they failed to recognize the true worth of this blessing and disputed their religion and lost it, this blessing now has been sent to them. This is such a code of guidance which shows the clear highway of Religion to man. The people who would turn it down by their own folly, would only prepare for their own doom, and only such people would become worthy of God's succour and mercy who would adopt obedience to it and lead a life of piety and righteousness.

In this connection, the followers of the Holy Prophet have been instructed that they should forbear and pardon the absurd and foolish behavior towards them of the people fearless of God, for if they showed patience God Himself would deal with their opponents and would reward them for their fortitude.

Then, there is a criticism of the erroneous ideas that the disbelievers hold about the Hereafter. They said that life was only this worldly life there was no life hereafter. Man dies in the course of time just as a watch stops functioning suddenly. The body is not survived by any soul, which might be seized and then breathed again into the human body some time in the future. In this regard, they challenged the Holy Prophet, saying: "If you lay a claim to this, then raise our dead forefathers back to life." In answer to this, Allah has given the following arguments:



"You do not say this on the basis of any knowledge but are uttering this grave thing on the basis of conjecture. Do you really have the knowledge that there is no other life after death, and the souls are not seized but are annihilated?"


"Your this claim rests mainly on this that you have not seen any dead person rising back to life and returning to the world. Is this basis strong enough for a person to make a claim that the dead people will never rise to life?When you do not experience and observe a thing, does it mean that you have the knowledge that it does not exist at all?


It is utterly against reason and justice that the good and the bad, the obedient and the disobedient, the oppressor and the oppressed, should be made equal ultimately. Neither a good act should bear a good result nor an evil act an evil result; neither the grievances of the oppressed be redressed nor the oppressor be punished, but everyone should meet with the same fate ultimately. Whoever has formed this view about the universe of God, has formed a patently wrong view. The unjust and wicked people adopt this view because they do not want to face the evil results of their deeds, but this world of God is not a lawless kingdom; it is rather a system based on the Truth, in which there can be no question of the injustice of regarding the good and the bad as equal.


That the creed of the denial of the Hereafter is highly destructive of morals. This is adopted only by such people as are the slaves of their lusts, and for the reason that they should have full freedom to serve their lusts. Then, when they have adopted this creed, it goes on making them more and more perverse till at last their moral sense becomes dead and all avenues of guidance are closed against them.


After giving these arguments Allah says most emphatically: "Just as you did not become living of your own accord, but became living by Our power, so you do not die of your own accord, but die when We send death on you. And a time is certainly coming when you will all be gathered together. If you do not believe in this because of your ignorance and folly today, you may not; when the time arrives, you will see for yourself that you are present before your God and your whole book of conduct is ready accurately, which bears evidence against each of your misdeeds. Then you will come to know how dearly has your denial of the Hereafter and your mockery of it cost you."
description: The surah that mentions The Kneeling of every community around the brink of Hellfire on the Day of Doom in wait of its divine judgment. It takes its name from the word “kneeling” (jāthiyah) in verse 28. The surah addresses some of the arguments put forward by those sceptical of the truthfulness of the Quran. Emphasis is placed on the signs of God’s existence discernible in nature, and on the painful punishment that awaits the doubters on the Day of Judgement. The misguided arrogance of the disbelievers (verse 8 and verse 31) is contrasted with God’s true greatness (verse 37); references to God’s wisdom and majesty open and close the surah.The surah is also known as: Bowing the Knee, Crouching, Hobbling, The Kneeling, The Kneeling Down.

Efendi Nahi.verse 45:2: (Kjo është) Shpallja e Librit të Perëndisë, të Plotëfuqishëm dhe të Gjithëdijshëm!
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:3: Me të vërtetë, në qiej dhe në Tokë ekzistojnë dokumente për ata që besojnë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:4: edhe në krijimin tuaj dhe të shtazëve, të shpërndara (nëpër Tokë), ka argument për popullin që beson me këmbëngulje;
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:5: edhe në ndërrimin e natës dhe të ditës, dhe në shiun që e lëshon Perëndia prej qielli e që me të e gjallëron tokën, pas thatësisë së saj, edhe ndërrimit të erërave, ka argumente për njerëzit që mendojnë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:6: Këto janë argumentet e Perëndisë, të cilat Ne ty t’i tregojmë me tërë të vërtetën, e në çfarë fjale, pos Allahut (Kur’anit) dhe argumenteve të Tij, do të besojnë ata?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:7: Mjerë për çdo gënjeshtar, mëkatar (të madh)!
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:8: (i cili) dëgjon argumentet e Perëndisë që i lexohen, e përsëri është mendjemadh (e duke mos pranuar), thuajse nuk i ka dëgjuar ato, sihariqoje atë me dënim të dhembshëm!
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:9: E, kur të njohtohet me diçka nga ajetet Tona, ai ato – i përqeshë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:10: Para tyre është xhehennemi, dhe nuk do t’ju ndihmojë asgjë ng ato që kanë fituar, as ata (idhujtë) që i kanë marrë, pos Perëndisë, për mbrojtës! Ata i pret mundim i madh.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:11: Ky është (Kur’ani) udhërrëfyes në rrugën e drejtë, e ata që nuk besojnë argumentet e Zotit të tyre, për ta ka mundim të madh, të dhembshëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:12: Perëndia është Ai që ju ka nënshtruar juve detin, që, nëpë të me urdhërin e Tij, të lundrojnë anijet, për t’i kërkur dhuntitë e Tij dhe për të qenë ju mirënjohës.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:13: Dhe ju ka nënshtruar juve çka gjendet në qiej dhe në Tokë, të gjitha janë prej Tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:14: Thuaju (o Muhammed!) besimtarëve që t’i falin ata që nuk shpresojnë në ditët e Perëndisë, në të cilën njerëzit do të shpërblehen sipas veprave të tyre.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:15: Kush bën mirë, e ka për vete (dobi), e kush bën keq – bënë kundër vetes, e në fund do të ktheheni (të gjithë) te Zoti juaj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:16: Ne, me të vërtetë, u kemi dhënë bijve të Israelit Librin, pushtetin dhe profetninë dhe i kemi furnizuar me gjëra të bukura, dhe i kemi ngritur at ambi të gjithë popujt tjerë (të asaj kohe),
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:17: dhe, u kemi dhënë argumente të qarta mbi besimin, e ata u përçanë, mu atëherë, kur u erdhi dijenia, pasiqë patën armiqësi në mes tyre.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:18: E, pastaj, Ne ty ta kemi bërë një rrugë të drejtë (të mrekullueshme) të fesë, andaj ndiqe atë dhe mos shko pas kënaqësive të atyre që nuk dinë!
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:19: Me të vërtetë, ata nuk do të mund të ndihmojnë (ty) asgjë te Perëndia.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:20: Ky Kur’an është argument i qartë (dritë e shpëtimit) udhërrëfyes dhe mëshirë për njerëzit që besojnë paluhatshëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:21: A mendojnë ata që bëjnë vepra të këqia se, Ne, do t’i bëjmë të njëjtë me ata që kanë besuar dhe që kanë bërë vepra të mira, se jeta dhe vdekja e tyre do të jetë e njëjtë? Sa gjykim i keq që është ky!
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:22: E, Perëndia, krijoi qiej dhe Tokë me qëllim të plotë, në mënyrë që çdo njeri të jetë i shpërblyer (apo i dënuar) për atë që ka punuar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:23: A e ke parë atë, që kënaqësinë e vet e ka marrë për zot, dhe Perëndia, e ka lënë në humbje duke e ditur (të keqen e tij) dhe ia ka vulosur të dëgjuarit e tij dhe zemrën e tij, e para syve të tij ka vënë perde? Kush do ta udhëzojë atë, pos Perëndisë? A nuk po kuptoni?
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:24: E, ata thonë: “Ekziston vetëm jeta e kësaj bote, vdesim (shumë si fëmijë) dhe jetojmë (një kohë), e vetëm koha na shkatërron”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:25: E, kur t’ju tregohen atyre ajetet Tona të qarta, ata nuk kanë tjetër shprehje, pos fjalës së tyre: “Ringjallni të parët tanë, nëse e thoni të vërtetën!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:26: Thuaju (atyre): “Perëndia ju ngjallë (u jep jetën), pastaj ju vdes, e mandej do t’ju tubojë në Ditën e Kijametit, në këtë nuk ka kurrfarë dyshimi, por (këtë) shumica e njerëzve nuk e dinë”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:27: Të Perëndisë janë pushteti i qiejve dhe i Tokës! E, kur të arrijë Dita e Kijametit, atë ditë të këqinjtë do të humbin.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:28: Dhe, të gjithë popujt do t’i shohësh të gjunjëzuar; çdo popull do të thirret në Librin e vet: “Sot do të shpërbleheni për atë që keni bërë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:29: Ky është Libri Ynë që do t’ju tregojë të vërtetën.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:30: E, sa i përket atyre që kanë besuar dhe kanë bërë vepra të mira, ata, do t’i shpie Zoti i tyre në mëshirën e Vet (xhennet).
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:31: E, sa i përket mohuesve, (atyre do t’ju thuhet): “Vallë, a nuk u janë lexuar ajetet e Mia, por ju u mendjemadhëruat dhe u bëtë popull mëkatarë”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:32: Kur të thuhet: “Me të vërtetë, premtimi i Perëndisë është i sigurt, dhe se për Ditën e Kijametit s’ka kurrfarë dyshimi! – ju thatë: “Na nuk dimë çka është Dita e Kijametit, na për këtë kemi vetëm një parafytyrim, na nuk jemi të bindur (për këtë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:33: Dhe, atyre do t’u dalin në shesh të këqit që i kanë bërë, e do t’i kaplojë dënimi për atë që talleshin,
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:34: dhe, (atyre) u thuhet: “Ne sot po ju qesim në harresë, ashtu siç e keni lënë ju në harresë takimin e kësaj dite.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:35: Ky dënim është ngase i keni përqeshur argumentet e Perëndisë, e jeta e kësaj bote ju ka mashtruar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 45:37: Atij i përket tërë madhështia në qiej dhe në Tokë.

null.verse 45:3: Həqiqətən, göylərdə və yerdə mö'minlər üçün ibrətlər vardır!
null.verse 45:4: Sizin yaradılışınızda və (Allahın yer üzünə) yayıb səpələdiyi canlılarda tam yəqinliklə inanlar üçün (Allahın birliyinə, qüdrət və əzəmətinə, qiyamət gününün haqq olmasına dəlalət edən) əlamətlər vardır.
null.verse 45:5: Gecə və gündüzün bir-birinin ardınca gəlib-getməsində, Allahın ruzi vermək üçün göydən yağış yağdırmasında, onun vasitəsilə yeri ölümündən (quruduqdan) sonra diriltməsində və küləkləri (müxtəlif tərəflərə) yönəltməsində ağılla düşünənlər üçün (Allahın hər şeyə qadir olmasını sübut edən) dəlillər vardır.
null.verse 45:6: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Bunlar Allahın ayələridir (qüdrət nişanələridir).
null.verse 45:7: Yalana dadanmış, günaha düşkün hər kəsin vay halına!
null.verse 45:8: O, Allahın ayələrini özünə oxunduğunu eşidir, sonra guya onları eşitmirmiş kimi (Allahın əmrinə qarşı) təkəbbür göstərərək (küfründə) israr edib durur.
null.verse 45:9: O, ayələrimizdən bir şey öyrənib bildiyi zaman onu lağa qoyur.
null.verse 45:10: Qarşıda (öləndən sonra) onları Cəhənnəm gözləyir.
null.verse 45:11: Bu (Qur'an) bir hidayətdir.
null.verse 45:12: Gəmilərin Onun əmri ilə dənizdə üzməsi və sizin də Onun lütfündən (orada) ruzi axtarmanız üçün dənizi sizə ram edən Allahdır! Bəlkə, şükür edəsiniz!
null.verse 45:13: Göylərdə və yerdə nə varsa, hamısını öz tərəfindən sizin ixtiyarınıza qoyan da Odur.
null.verse 45:14: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) İman gətirənlərə de ki, Allah etdiyi əməllərə görə hər hansı bir qövmün cəzasını (özü) versin deyə, Allahın (əzab) günlərindən qorxmayanları (əzab günlərinə, qiyamətə inanmadıqları üçün gözləməyənləri) bağışlasınlar! (Bu ayənin hökmü sonralar cihad haqqındakı ayə ilə ləğv edilmişdir).
null.verse 45:15: Kim yaxşı bir iş görsə, xeyiri özünə, kim də bir pislik etsə, zərəri özünə olar! Sonra siz öz Rəbbinizə doğru qaytarılacaqsınız.
null.verse 45:16: And olsun ki, Biz İsrail oğullarına Kitab, hikmət (Tövratda olmayan hökmlər, yaxud mübahisəli məsələləri ədalətlə həll etmək bacarığı) və peyğəmbərlik əta etmiş, onlara pak ne'mətlərdən ruzi vermiş və onları aləmlərə (zəmanələrindəki bəşər övladına) üstün etmişdik.
null.verse 45:17: Onlara din işində (dini məsələlərdə və ya Muhəmməd əleyhissəlamın peyğəmbər göndəriləcəyi barədə) açıq-aşkar dəlillər vermişdik.
null.verse 45:18: Sonra (ya Rəsulum!) səni də dində şəriət sahibi (bir şəriət üzrə qaim) etdik.
null.verse 45:19: Şübhəsiz ki, onlar Allahdan gələcək bir şeyi (bəlanı, əzabı) səndən dəf edə bilməzlər.
null.verse 45:20: Bu (Qur'an) insanlar üçün bəsirət gözü, (axirətə) tam yəqinliklə inanan bir qövm üçün də hidayət (doğru yolu göstərən rəhbər) və mərhəmətdir!
null.verse 45:21: Yoxsa dünyada pis əməllər edənlər (axirətdə) onları iman gətirib yaxşı işlər görənlərlə bir tutacağımızı, onların həyatlarının və ölümlərinin eyni olacağını güman edirlər?! Onlar nə pis mühakimə yürüdürlər! (Dünyada naz-ne'mət içində yaşayan kafirlər: "Əgər qiyamət günü, axirət doğrudursa, Allah bizə orada da firavan həyat bəxş edəcəkdir!" - deyirlər.
null.verse 45:22: Allah göyləri və yeri haqq-ədalətlə və hər kəsin qazandığı nə isə onun müqabilində əvəz (qarşılıq) görməsi üçün yaratmışdır.
null.verse 45:23: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Nəfsini özünə tanrı edən və Allahın bilərəkdən (onu hələ yaratmamışdan gələcəkdə kafir olacağını bildiyi üçün) yoldan çıxartdığı, qulağını və qəlbini möhürlədiyi, gözünə də pərdə çəkdiyi kimsəni gördünmü? Allahdan başqa kim onu doğru yola sala bilər?! Məgər düşünüb ibrət almırsınız? (Haqqı bildiyi halda küfr edənin cəzası, haqqı bilmədən, cahilliyi üzündən küfr edənin cəzasından daha ağırdır.
null.verse 45:24: (Qiyaməti inkar edənlər) belə deyirlər: "Dünya həyatımızdan başqa heç bir həyat yoxdur; ölürük və dirilirik (biri ölür, digəri anadan olur; biz ölürük, övladlarımız, nəslimiz isə yaşayır); bizi öldürən ancaq dəhrdir (zamanın gərdişi, ömür müddətidir; yaşa dolub qocalmağımızdır).
null.verse 45:25: (Qiyamətə dair) ayələrimiz onlara açıq-aşkar oxunduğu (söyləndiyi) zaman onların dəlili: "Əgər doğru deyirsinizsə, (vəfat etmiş) atalarımızı (dirildib) gətirin görək!" - deməkdən başqa bir şey deyildir.
null.verse 45:26: (Ya Peğəmbər!) De: "Allah sizi dirildir, sonra öldürür.
null.verse 45:27: Göylərin və yerin hökmü ancaq Allahın əlindədir.
null.verse 45:28: (Ya Peyğəmbər! O gün) hər ümməti diz çökmüş (yaxud bir yerə yığılmış) görəcəksən.
null.verse 45:29: Bu Bizim kitabımızdır (sizin əməl dəftərinizdir).
null.verse 45:30: İman gətirib yaxşı əməl edənlərə gəldikdə, Rəbbi onları ?z mərhəmətinə (Cənnətə) qovuşduracaqdır.
null.verse 45:31: Kafir olanlara isə (belə deyiləcəkdir): "Məgər ayələrim (dünyada) sizə oxunmurdumu?! Amma siz (onlara qulaq asmağa, iman gətirməyə) təkəbbür göstərdiniz və günahkar bir tayfa oldunuz!
null.verse 45:32: (Sizə: ) "Allahın (ölüləri dirildəcəyi barədəki) və'di haqdır və o saata (qiyamətin qopacağına) heç bir şəkk-şübhə yoxdur!" - deyildiyi zaman: "O saat nədir, bilmirik! Onun ancaq bir zənn (güman) olduğu qənaətindəyik.
null.verse 45:33: (O gün dünyada etdikləri) pis əməllərinin cəzası onların gözünə görünəcək və istehza etdikləri (əzab) onları saracaqdır!
null.verse 45:34: (Onlara belə) deyiləcəkdir: "Siz bu gününüzə qovuşacağınızı (dünyada) unutduğunuz kimi, Biz də bu gün sizi unudacağıq (əbədi əzab içində buraxacağıq).
null.verse 45:35: Bu (əzab) ona görədir ki, siz Allahın ayələrini lağa qoyurdunuz; dünya həyatı sizi aldatmışdı!" Bu gün onlar (Cəhənnəmdən) çıxarılmayacaq və onlardan (Allahı razı salan) heç bir üzrxahlıq (tövbə də) qəbul olunmaycaqdır!
null.verse 45:36: (Və'dinə sadiq qalaraq mö'min bəndələrinə verdiyi ne'mətlərə və kafirləri, azğınları düçar etdiyi əzaba görə) göylərin Rəbbi, yerin Rəbbi və aləmlərin Rəbbi olan Allaha həmd olsun!
null.verse 45:37: Göylərdə və yerdə böyüklük (ululuq yalnız) Ona məxsusdur.

null.verse 45:2: Knjigu objavljuje Allah, Silni i Mudri!
null.verse 45:3: Na nebesima i na Zemlji, zaista, postoje dokazi za one koji vjeruju;
null.verse 45:4: i stvaranje vas i životinja koje je razasuo dokazi su za ljude koji su čvrsto ubijeđeni;
null.verse 45:5: i smjena noći i dana i kiša, koju Allah s neba spušta da pomoću nje zemlju, nakon mrtvila njezina, oživi i promjena vjetrova - dokazi su za ljude koji imaju pameti.
null.verse 45:6: To su Allahovi dokazi koje ti kao istinu navodimo pa u koje će - ako ne u Allahove riječi i dokaze Njegove oni vjerovati?
null.verse 45:7: Teško svakom lašcu, velikom grješniku!
null.verse 45:8: On čuje Allahove riječi kada mu se kazuju, pa opet ostaje ohol kao da ih čuo nije - njemu patnju neizdrživu navijesti!
null.verse 45:9: A kad sazna za neke Naše ajete, on im se ruga.
null.verse 45:10: Pred njima je Džehennem, i ni od kakve koristi im neće biti ono što su stekli, ni kumiri koje su, pored Allaha, prihvatili; njih čeka muka golema.
null.verse 45:11: Ovaj Kur’an je prava uputa, a one koji ne vjeruju u dokaze Gospodara svoga čeka patnja nesnosna.
null.verse 45:12: Allah vam daje da se morem koristite da bi lađe, voljom Njegovom, po njemu plovile, da biste mogli tražiti blagodati Njegove i da biste bili zahvalni.
null.verse 45:13: I daje vam da se koristite onim što je na nebesima i onim što je na Zemlji, sve je od Njega.
null.verse 45:14: Reci vjernicima da oproste onima koji ne očekuju Allahove dane u kojima će On nagraditi ljude za ono što su radili.
null.verse 45:15: Onaj koji čini dobro - sebi ga čini, a onaj ko radi zlo - radi protiv sebe, a na kraju ćete se Gospodaru svome vratiti.
null.verse 45:16: Sinovima Israilovim smo Knjigu i vlast i vjerovjesništvo dali i lijepim jelima smo ih bili opskrbili, i iznad svih naroda ih uzdigli,
null.verse 45:17: i jasne dokaze o vjeri smo im dali, a oni su se podvojili baš onda kad su do saznanja došli, i to zbog neprijateljstva i međusobne zavisti.
null.verse 45:18: A tebi smo poslije odredili da u vjeri ideš pravcem određenim, zato ga slijedi i ne povodi se za strastima onih koji ne znaju,
null.verse 45:19: jer te oni nikako ne mogu od Allahove kazne odbraniti; nevjernici jedni druge štite, a Allah štiti one koji Ga se boje i grijeha klone.
null.verse 45:20: Ovaj Kur’an je putokaz ljudima i uputstvo i milost onima koji čvrsto vjeruju.
null.verse 45:21: Misle li oni koji čine zla djela, da ćemo s njima postupiti jednako kao sa onima koji vjeruju i dobra djela čine, da će im život i smrt biti isti? Kako loše rasuđuju!
null.verse 45:22: A Allah je nebesa i Zemlju mudro stvorio i zato da bi svaki čovjek bio nagrađen ili kažnjen prema onome što je zaslužio, nikome neće biti učinjeno nažao.
null.verse 45:23: Reci ti Meni ko će uputiti onoga koji je strast svoju za boga svoga uzeo, onoga koga je Allah, znajući ga, u zabudi ostavio i sluh njegov i srce njegovo zapečatio, a pred oči njegove koprenu stavio? Ko će mu, ako neće Allah,
null.verse 45:24: Postoji samo naš život zemaljski, živimo i umiremo, jedino nas vrijeme uništi - govore oni.
null.verse 45:25: A kad im se ajeti Naši jasni kazuju, samo se ovim riječima izgovaraju: "Pretke naše u život povratite, ako je istina to što govorite.
null.verse 45:26: Reci: "Allah vam daje život, zatim će učiniti da poumirete, a poslije će vas na Sudnjem danu sabrati, u to nema nikakve sumnje, ali većina ljudi ne zna.
null.verse 45:27: Allahova je vlast na nebesima i na Zemlji! A na dan kada nastupi Čas oživljenja, oni koji su laži slijedili biće izgubljeni.
null.verse 45:28: I vidjećeš sve narode kako na koljenima kleče; svaki narod biće prozvan prema svojoj Knjizi: "Danas ćete biti nagrađeni ili kažnjeni prema tome kako ste postupali!
null.verse 45:29: Ova Knjiga Naša o vama će samo istinu reći, jer smo naredili da se zapiše sve što ste radili.
null.verse 45:30: One koji su vjerovali i dobra djela činili, Gospodar njihov će u Džennet Svoj uvesti.
null.verse 45:31: A onima koji nisu vjerovali: "Zar vam ajeti Moji nisu kazivani, ali vi ste se oholili i narod nevjernički postali.
null.verse 45:32: Kad se govorilo: ’Allahovo obećanje je, zaista, istina i u Čas oživljenja nema nimalo sumnje!’ - vi ste govorili: ’Mi ne znamo šta je Čas oživljenja, mi samo zamišljamo, mi nismo ubijeđeni’";
null.verse 45:33: i ukazaće im se gnusna djela njihova i sa svih strana će ih okružiti ono čemu su se rugali,
null.verse 45:34: i reći će se: "Danas ćemo mi vas zaboraviti kao što ste vi zaboravili da ćete ovaj vaš Dan doživjeti, vatra će vam prebivalište biti i niko vam neće moći pomoći
null.verse 45:35: zato što ste se Allahovim riječima rugali i što vas je život na Zemlji bio obmanuo.
null.verse 45:36: Pa, neka je hvaljen Allah, Gospodar nebesa i Gospodar Zemlje, Gospodar svih svjetova!
null.verse 45:37: Njemu ponos i dika na nebesima i na Zemlji, On je Silni i Mudri! svjetova!

null.verse 45:2: পরাক্রান্ত, প্রজ্ঞাময় আল্লাহর পক্ষ থেকে অবতীর্ণ এ কিতাব।
null.verse 45:3: নিশ্চয় নভোমন্ডল ও ভূ-মন্ডলে মুমিনদের জন্যে নিদর্শনাবলী রয়েছে।
null.verse 45:4: আর তোমাদের সৃষ্টিতে এবং চারদিকে ছড়িয়ে রাখা জীব জন্তুর সৃজনের মধ্যেও নিদর্শনাবলী রয়েছে বিশ্বাসীদের জন্য।
null.verse 45:5: দিবারাত্রির পরিবর্তনে, আল্লাহ আকাশ থেকে যে রিযিক (বৃষ্টি) বর্ষণ করেন অতঃপর পৃথিবীকে তার মৃত্যুর পর পুনরুজ্জীবিত করেন, তাতে এবং বায়ুর পরিবর্তনে বুদ্ধিমানদের জন্যে নিদর্শনাবলী রয়েছে।
null.verse 45:6: এগুলো আল্লাহর আয়াত, যা আমি আপনার কাছে আবৃত্তি করি যথাযথরূপে। অতএব, আল্লাহ ও তাঁর আয়াতের পর তারা কোন কথায় বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করবে।
null.verse 45:7: প্রত্যেক মিথ্যাবাদী পাপাচারীর দুর্ভোগ।
null.verse 45:8: সে আল্লাহর আয়াতসমূহ শুনে, অতঃপর অহংকারী হয়ে জেদ ধরে, যেন সে আয়াত শুনেনি। অতএব, তাকে যন্ত্রণাদায়ক শাস্তির সুসংবাদ দিন।
null.verse 45:9: যখন সে আমার কোন আয়াত অবগত হয়, তখন তাকে ঠাট্টারূপে গ্রহণ করে। এদের জন্যই রয়েছে লাঞ্ছনাদায়ক শাস্তি।
null.verse 45:10: তাদের সামনে রয়েছে জাহান্নাম। তারা যা উপার্জন করেছে, তা তাদের কোন কাজে আসবে না, তারা আল্লাহর পরিবর্তে যাদেরকে বন্ধুরূপে গ্রহণ করেছে তারাও নয়। তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে মহাশাস্তি।
null.verse 45:11: এটা সৎপথ প্রদর্শন, আর যারা তাদের পালনকর্তার আয়াতসমূহ অস্বীকার করে, তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে কঠোর যন্ত্রণাদায়ক শাস্তি।
null.verse 45:12: তিনি আল্লাহ যিনি সমুদ্রকে তোমাদের উপকারার্থে আয়ত্বাধীন করে দিয়েছেন, যাতে তাঁর আদেশক্রমে তাতে জাহাজ চলাচল করে এবং যাতে তোমরা তাঁর অনুগ্রহ তালাশ কর ও তাঁর প্রতি কৃতজ্ঞ হও।
null.verse 45:13: এবং আয়ত্ত্বাধীন করে দিয়েছেন তোমাদের, যা আছে নভোমন্ডলে ও যা আছে ভূমন্ডলে; তাঁর পক্ষ থেকে। নিশ্চয় এতে চিন্তাশীল সম্প্রদায়ের জন্যে নিদর্শনাবলী রয়েছে।
null.verse 45:14: মুমিনদেরকে বলুন, তারা যেন তাদেরকে ক্ষমা করে, যারা আল্লাহর সে দিনগুলো সম্পর্কে বিশ্বাস রাখে না যাতে তিনি কোন সম্প্রদায়কে কৃতকর্মের প্রতিফল দেন।
null.verse 45:15: যে সৎকাজ করছে, সে নিজের কল্যাণার্থেই তা করছে, আর যে অসৎকাজ করছে, তা তার উপরই বর্তাবে। অতঃপর তোমরা তোমাদের পালনকর্তার দিকে প্রত্যাবর্তিত হবে।
null.verse 45:16: আমি বনী ইসরাঈলকে কিতাব, রাজত্ব ও নবুওয়ত দান করেছিলাম এবং তাদেরকে পরিচ্ছন্ন রিযিক দিয়েছিলাম এবং বিশ্ববাসীর উপর শ্রেষ্ঠত্ব দিয়েছিলাম।
null.verse 45:17: আরও দিয়েছিলাম তাদেরকে ধর্মের সুস্পষ্ট প্রমাণাদি। অতঃপর তারা জ্ঞান লাভ করার পর শুধু পারস্পরিক জেদের বশবর্তী হয়ে মতভেদ সৃষ্টি করেছে। তারা যে বিষয়ে মতভেদ করত, আপনার পালনকর্তা কেয়ামতের দিন তার ফয়সালা করে দেবেন।
null.verse 45:18: এরপর আমি আপনাকে রেখেছি ধর্মের এক বিশেষ শরীয়তের উপর। অতএব, আপনি এর অনুসরণ করুন এবং অজ্ঞানদের খেয়াল-খুশীর অনুসরণ করবেন না।
null.verse 45:19: আল্লাহর সামনে তারা আপনার কোন উপকারে আসবে না। যালেমরা একে অপরের বন্ধু। আর আল্লাহ পরহেযগারদের বন্ধু।
null.verse 45:20: এটা মানুষের জন্যে জ্ঞানের কথা এবং বিশ্বাসী সম্প্রদায়ের জন্য হেদায়েত ও রহমত।
null.verse 45:21: যারা দুস্কর্ম উপার্জন করেছে তারা কি মনে করে যে, আমি তাদেরকে সে লোকদের মত করে দেব, যারা ঈমান আনে ও সৎকর্ম করে এবং তাদের জীবন ও মুত্যু কি সমান হবে? তাদের দাবী কত মন্দ।
null.verse 45:22: আল্লাহ নভোমন্ডল ও ভূ-মন্ডল যথাযথভাবে সৃষ্টি করেছেন, যাতে প্রত্যেক ব্যক্তি তার উপার্জনের ফল পায়। তাদের প্রতি যুলুম করা হবে না।
null.verse 45:23: আপনি কি তার প্রতি লক্ষ্য করেছেন, যে তার খেয়াল-খুশীকে স্বীয় উপাস্য স্থির করেছে? আল্লাহ জেনে শুনে তাকে পথভ্রষ্ট করেছেন, তার কান ও অন্তরে মহর এঁটে দিয়েছেন এবং তার চোখের উপর রেখেছেন পর্দা। অতএব, আল্লাহর পর কে তাকে পথ প্রদর্শন করবে? তোমরা কি চিন্তাভাবনা কর না?
null.verse 45:24: তারা বলে, আমাদের পার্থিব জীবনই তো শেষ; আমরা মরি ও বাঁচি মহাকালই আমাদেরকে ধ্বংস করে। তাদের কাছে এ ব্যাপারে কোন জ্ঞান নেই। তারা কেবল অনুমান করে কথা বলে।
null.verse 45:25: তাদের কাছে যখন আমার সুস্পষ্ট আয়াতসমূহ পাঠ করা হয়, তখন একথা বলা ছাড়া তাদের কোন মুক্তিই থাকে না যে, তোমরা সত্যবাদী হলে আমাদের পূর্বপুরুষদেরকে নিয়ে আস।
null.verse 45:26: আপনি বলুন, আল্লাহই তোমাদেরকে জীবন দান করেন, অতঃপর মৃত্যু দেন, অতঃপর তোমাদেরকে কেয়ামতের দিন একত্রিত করবেন, যাতে কোন সন্দেহ নেই। কিন্তু অধিকাংশ মানুষ বোঝে না।
null.verse 45:27: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূ-মন্ডলের রাজত্ব আল্লাহরই। যেদিন কেয়ামত সংঘটিত হবে, সেদিন মিথ্যাপন্থীরা ক্ষতিগ্রস্ত হবে।
null.verse 45:28: আপনি প্রত্যেক উম্মতকে দেখবেন নতজানু অবস্থায়। প্রত্যেক উম্মতকে তাদের আমলনামা দেখতে বলা হবে। তোমরা যা করতে, অদ্য তোমারদেরকে তার প্রতিফল দেয়া হবে।
null.verse 45:29: আমার কাছে রক্ষিত এই আমলনামা তোমাদের সম্পর্কে সত্য কথা বলবে। তোমরা যা করতে আমি তা লিপিবদ্ধ করতাম।
null.verse 45:30: যারা বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করেছে ও সৎকর্ম করেছে, তাদেরকে তাদের পালনকর্তা স্বীয় রহমতে দাখিল করবেন। এটাই প্রকাশ্য সাফল্য।
null.verse 45:31: আর যারা কুফর করেছে, তাদেরকে জিজ্ঞাসা করা হবে, তোমাদের কাছে কি আয়াতসমূহ পঠিত হত না? কিন্তু তোমরা অহংকার করছিলে এবং তোমরা ছিলে এক অপরাধী সম্প্রদায়।
null.verse 45:32: যখন বলা হত, আল্লাহর ওয়াদা সত্য এবং কেয়ামতে কোন সন্দেহ নেই, তখন তোমরা বলতে আমরা জানি না কেয়ামত কি ? আমরা কেবল ধারণাই করি এবং এ বিষয়ে আমরা নিশ্চিত নই।
null.verse 45:33: তাদের মন্দ কর্ম গুলো তাদের সামনে প্রকাশ হয়ে পড়বে এবং যে আযাব নিয়ে তারা ঠাট্টা-বিদ্রুপ করত, তা তাদেরকে গ্রাস করবে।
null.verse 45:34: বলা হবে, আজ আমি তোমাদেরকে ভুলে যাব, যেমন তোমরা এ দিনের সাক্ষাৎকে ভুলে গিয়েছিলে। তোমাদের আবাসস্থল জাহান্নাম এবং তোমাদের সাহায্যকারী নেই।
null.verse 45:35: এটা এজন্যে যে, তোমরা আল্লাহর আয়াতসমূহকে ঠাট্টারূপে গ্রহণ করেছিলে এবং পার্থিব জীবন তোমাদেরকে প্রতারিত করেছিল। সুতরাং আজ তাদেরকে জাহান্নাম থেকে বের করা হবে না এবং তাদের কাছে তওবা চাওয়া হবে না।
null.verse 45:36: অতএব, বিশ্বজগতের পালনকর্তা, ভূ-মন্ডলের পালনকর্তা ও নভোমন্ডলের পালনকর্তা আল্লাহর-ই প্রশংসা।
null.verse 45:37: নভোমন্ডলে ও ভূ-মন্ডলে তাঁরই গৌরব। তিনি পরাক্রমশালী, প্রজ্ঞাময়। প্রশংসা।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:2: Низпославането на Книгата е от Аллах, Всемогъщия, Премъдрия.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:3: На небесата и на земята има знамения за вярващите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:4: И във вашето сътворяване, и в това на тварите, пръснати [по земята], има знамения за хора убедени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:5: И промяната на нощта и деня, и онова, което Аллах изсипва от небето за препитание, и съживява с него земята след нейната смърт, и смяната на ветровете, са знамения за хора проумяващи.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:8: Чува той знаменията на Аллах да му се четат, после надменно упорства, сякаш че не ги е чул.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:9: И щом узнае нещо от Нашите знамения, той им се подиграва.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:13: Аллах е, Който подчини за вас морето, за да плават там корабите според Неговата повеля и за да търсите от Неговото обилие.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:14: И подчини Той за вас всичко на небесата и всичко на земята - всичко е от Него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:15: Кажи на вярващите да прощават на онези, които не очакват дните на Аллах, но Той ще въздаде на всички хора, каквото са придобили!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:16: Който върши праведни дела, то е за самия него, а който върши злини, то е в негов ущърб.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:17: И дадохме на синовете на Исраил Писанието и отсъждането, и пророчеството, и им дарихме от благата, и ги предпочетохме над народите .
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:18: И им дадохме ясни знаци за
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:20: После ти отредихме [о, Мухаммад] да си на правия път в повелята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:21: Те не могат да те избавят от Аллах с нищо.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:23: е прозрение за хората и напътствие, и милост за убедените.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:24: Нима онези, които вършат злини, смятат, че в живота им и в смъртта им ще ги сторим равни с онези, които вярват и вършат праведни дела? Колко лошо отсъждат!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:25: И сътвори Аллах небесата и земята с мъдрост, и за да се въздаде на всяка душа, каквото е придобила, и не ще бъдат угнетени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:26: Не виждаш ли онзи, който взима за божество своите страсти? И го остави Аллах в заблуда, знаейки, и запечата слуха и сърцето му, и сложи преграда пред погледа му.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:27: И казват: Съществува само земният ни живот.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:28: И когато им бъдат четени ясните Ни знамения, техният довод е само да рекат: Елате с предците ни, ако говорите истината!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:29: Кажи: Аллах ви съживява, после ви умъртвява, после ще ви събере в Деня на възкресението, за който няма съмнение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:30: На Аллах принадлежи владението на небесата и на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:31: И ще видиш всяка общност на колене.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:33: Онези, които вярват и вършат праведни дела, техният Господ ще ги въведе в Своята милост.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:34: А на онези, които не вярват [ще се каже]: Не ви ли бяха четени Моите знамения? Но се възгордяхте и бяхте хора-престъпници.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:35: И когато се каза, че обещанието на Аллах е истинно, и че няма съмнение за Часа, рекохте: Не знаем какво е Часът - само предполагаме, но не сме убедени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:36: И ще се появят пред тях злините, които те извършиха, и ще ги обгради онова, на което се подиграваха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:37: И ще се рече: Днес ще ви забравим, както и вие забравихте срещата в този свой Ден.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:38: Това е, защото се подигравахте със знаменията на Аллах и ви изкуси земният живот.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:39: Прославата е за Аллах - Господа на небесата и Господа на земята, Господа на световете.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 45:40: Негово е величието на небесата и на земята.

null.verse 45:2: 這本經是從至仁至睿的真主降示的。
null.verse 45:3: 天上地上，在信道者看來確有許多蹟象。
null.verse 45:4: 真主創造你們，並散布各種動物，在堅信者看來，其中有許多蹟象。
null.verse 45:5: 晝夜的輪流，真主從雲中降下給養，就借它而使已死的大地復活，以及改變風向；在能了解的人看來，其中有許多蹟象。
null.verse 45:6: 這些是真主的蹟象，我本真理而對你敘述它。在真主的訓辭和蹟象之後，你們還要信甚麼訓辭呢？
null.verse 45:7: 哀哉每個妄言的多罪者！
null.verse 45:8: 他聽見別人對他宣讀真主的蹟象時，便自大而固執，好像沒有聽見似的，所以你應當以痛苦的刑罰向他報喜。
null.verse 45:9: 當他知道我的一點蹟象的時候，就把它當作笑柄。這等人將受凌辱的刑罰。
null.verse 45:10: 他們的身後有火獄，他們所獲得的，對於他們，毫無裨益；他們捨真主而認為保護神的，對於他們，也毫無裨益，他們將受痛苦的刑罰�
null.verse 45:11: 這是正道，不信其主的蹟象者將受痛苦的極刑。
null.verse 45:12: 真主為你們而制服海洋，以便船舶奉他的命令而航行，以便你們尋求他的恩惠，以便你們感謝。
null.verse 45:13: 他為你們而制服天地萬物，對於能思維的民眾，此中確有許多蹟象。
null.verse 45:14: 你對信道者說，要赦宥不怕真主的氣運的人們，以便真主因民眾的善行而賜以報酬。
null.verse 45:15: 行善者自受其益，作惡者自受其害。然後，你們要被召歸於你們的主。
null.verse 45:16: 我確已把天經、智慧、預言，賞賜以色列的後裔，並以佳美的食品供給他們，且使他們超軼各民族。
null.verse 45:17: 我曾昭示他們關於此事的許多明証，他們在知識降臨他們之後，才因互相嫉妒而爭論。復活日，你的主必定判決他們所爭論的是非。
null.verse 45:18: 然後，我使你遵循關於此事的常道。你應當遵守那常道，不要順從無知者的私欲。
null.verse 45:19: 他們必定不能為你抵御真主的刑罰一絲毫。不義者必定互相監護；真主是監護敬畏者的。
null.verse 45:20: 這是世人的明証，也是對堅信的民眾的引導和恩惠。
null.verse 45:21: 難道作惡者以為我會使他們和信道而且行善者一樣，而使他們的生死相等嗎？他們的判斷真惡劣！
null.verse 45:22: 真主本真理而創造天地，以便每個人都因其行為而受報酬，他們將來不受虧枉。
null.verse 45:23: 你告訴我吧！以私欲為主宰的人，真主使他明知故違地迷誤，並封閉他的耳和心，在他的眼上加翳膜；真主使他迷誤之後，誰還能引導他呢？難道你們不覺悟嗎？
null.verse 45:24: 他們說：「只有我們的今世生活，我們死的死，生的生，只有光陰能使我們消滅。」他們對於那裡，一無所知，他們專事猜測。
null.verse 45:25: 有人對他們宣讀我的明顯的蹟象的時候，他們只是借口說：「你們把我們的祖先召喚回來吧，如果你們是說實話的。」
null.verse 45:26: 你說：「真主使你們生，然後使你們死，然後在毫無疑義的復活日集合你們；但世人大半不知道。」
null.verse 45:27: 天地的國權，歸真主所有。復活時來臨之日，反對真理者將受虧折。
null.verse 45:28: 你將來會看見，每一民族都是屈膝的，每一民族都要被召去看自己的功過簿。「今日，你們將受自己行為的報酬。」
null.verse 45:29: 這是我立的功過簿，它對你們秉公作証。我確已下令記錄你們的行為。
null.verse 45:30: 至於信道而且行善者，他們的主要使他們入於他的恩惠中，那確是明顯的成功。
null.verse 45:31: 至於不信道者，（我說）：「難道沒有人對你們宣讀過我的蹟象嗎？但你們自大，你們原是犯罪的民眾。」
null.verse 45:32: 有人說：「真主的應許，確是真實的；復活時是毫無疑義的。」你們就說：「我們不知道復活時是甚麼，我們只猜想那或許是要發生的，但我們並不確信。」
null.verse 45:33: 他們所作的罪惡，將來要對他們顯現；他們所嘲笑的刑罰，將來要來臨他們。
null.verse 45:34: 或者將對他們說：「今日，我忽視你們，如你們以前忽視今日的相會一樣。你們的歸宿是火獄，你們絕沒有援助者。
null.verse 45:35: 那是由於你們把真主的蹟象當作笑柄，塵世的生活欺騙了你們的緣故。」今日，他們不被放出火獄，也不得邀恩。
null.verse 45:36: 一切讚頌，只歸真主——諸天的主，大地的主，全世界的主！
null.verse 45:37: 天地間的偉大，只屬於他；他是萬能的，是至睿的。 一切讚頌，只歸真主——諸天的主，大地的主，全世界的主！

null.verse 45:2: Seslání Písma od Boha mocného, moudrého pochází.
null.verse 45:3: Na nebesích i na zemi jsou věru pro věřící znamení,
null.verse 45:4: a také ve stvoření vašem i ve zvířatech, jež po zemi rozmnožil, jsou znamení pro lid pevně přesvědčený,
null.verse 45:5: i ve střídání noci a dne, i v tom, co Bůh z nebes sesílá jako obživu a oživuje tím zemi poté, co mrtvá byla, a rovněž ve větrů vysílání jsou znamení pro lid rozumný.
null.verse 45:6: Toto jsou znamení Boží, jež podle pravdy ti sdělujeme.
null.verse 45:7: Běda každému pomluvači hříšnému,
null.verse 45:8: jenž naslouchá znamením Božím, když jsou mu sdělována, však potom v pýše své setrvává, jako by je ani neslyšel! O trestu bolestném zvěst oznam jemu!
null.verse 45:9: A když naučí se něčemu ze znamení Naších, tropí si z toho jen posměšky.
null.verse 45:10: Za nimi peklo číhá a nebude jim platné nic z toho, co si vysloužili, ani to, co místo Boha jako ochránce si vzali a pro ně určen je trest nesmírný.
null.verse 45:11: Toto je správné vedení a ti, kdož neuvěřili v Pána svého znamení, trestem muk bolestných budou potrestáni.
null.verse 45:12: Bůh je ten, jenž podrobil vám moře, aby po něm lodi podle rozkazu Jeho pluly a abyste na něm o část přízně Jeho usilovali - snad za to budete vděčni!
null.verse 45:13: On podmanil vám vše, co na nebesích je i na zemi, a všechno od Něho pochází.
null.verse 45:14: Rci těm, kdož uvěřili, ať promíjejí těm, kdož nedoufají ve dny Boží, jež dostaví se, aby byli lidé za to, co si vysloužili, odměněni.
null.verse 45:15: Kdo zbožné skutky koná, sám pro sebe tak činí, však kdo zlé koná, sám proti sobě samému tak činí; a posléze budete k Pánu svému navráceni.
null.verse 45:16: A dali jsme kdysi již dítkám Izraele Písmo, moudrost i proroctví a uštědřili jsme jim jídel výtečných hojnost a nad lidstvem veškerým jsme je vyznamenali.
null.verse 45:17: A dali jsme jim jasné důkazy z rozkazu našeho pocházející.
null.verse 45:18: A potom jsme tě umístili na cestě zákona z rozkazu Našeho vycházející.
null.verse 45:19: Vždyť tihle nikterak ti proti Bohu neprospějí; nespravedliví jsou si navzájem přáteli, však Bůh bohabojných je přítelem.
null.verse 45:20: Toto Písmo lidem viditelné důkazy dává a je vedením i milosrdenstvím pro lid, jenž pevně je přesvědčen.
null.verse 45:21: Což domnívají se ti, kdož zlého se dopouštějí, že učiníme je rovnými s těmi, kdož věří a zbožné skutky konají, v životě i ve smrti? Jak špatný je to úsudek!
null.verse 45:22: Bůh stvořil nebesa i zemi jako skutečnost, aby mohl odměnit duši každou za to, co si vysloužila; a nebude jim ukřivděno.
null.verse 45:23: Co soudíš o tom, jenž učinil si božstvem svým svou vášeň a jemuž Bůh dal vědomě zbloudit a zapečetil sluch i srdce jeho a zastřel zrak jeho rouškou? Kdo povede jej kromě Boha správnou cestou? Což se nevzpamatují?
null.verse 45:24: Říkají: "Neexistuje leč tento náš život pozemský, zemřeme a žijeme a pouze čas nás zahubí!" Však o tom, co říkají, žádných vědomostí nemají a jenom se tak dohadují.
null.verse 45:25: A když jsou jim sdělována Naše znamení jasná, nemají jiného důkazu, než že říkají: "Přiveďte tedy předky naše, jste-li pravdomluvní!"
null.verse 45:26: Odpověz: "Bůh život vám dává a pak i smrt; a posléze vás shromáždí pro den zmrtvýchvstání, o němž pochybnosti není, však většina z lidí to neví.
null.verse 45:27: Bohu náleží království nebes a země; a v den, kdy Hodina udeří, v ten den ztrátu utrpí ti, kdož pravdu popírali.
null.verse 45:28: A uvidíš národy všechny klečet a každý národ ke své knize bude povolán se slovy: "Dnes dostanete odměnu svou za to, co jste konali.
null.verse 45:29: Tato Naše kniha hovoří proti vám pravdivě a zaznamenávali jsme do ní vše, co jste dělali.
null.verse 45:30: Pokud se týká těch, kdož uvěřili a zbožné skutky konali, ty uvede Pán jejich do milosrdenství Svého - a to úspěch je zřetelný.
null.verse 45:31: A pokud se týká těch, kdož nevěřili, těm bude řečeno: "Což nebyla vám znamení Naše sdělena? Však byli jste pyšní a byli jste lid hříšný!
null.verse 45:32: A když bylo vám řečeno: "Slib Boží je skutečností a věru o Hodině pochyby není!" pak jste odpovídali: "Nevíme, co je to Hodina, máme jen domněnky své a nejsme o ní nikterak přesvědčeni.
null.verse 45:33: A objeví se špatnost jejich počínání a obklíčí je to, čemu se posmívali.
null.verse 45:34: A bude jim řečeno: "Dnes my na vás zapomeneme tak, jako jste vy zapomněli na setkání s tímto svým dnem; a útočištěm vaším bude oheň a nebudete mít pomocníka žádného.
null.verse 45:35: A to je odměna za to, že znamení Boží jste pro smích měli a že vás život pozemský svedl!" A v ten den nebudou odtud vyvedeni a nebudou ani k pokání vyzváni.
null.verse 45:36: A budiž chvála Bohu, Pánu nebes i Pánu země, Pánu lidstva veškerého!
null.verse 45:37: Jemu náleží velkolepost na nebesích i na zemi a On mocný je i moudrý! veškerého!

null.verse 45:2: De openbaring van dit Boek is van God, de Almachtige, de Alwijze.
null.verse 45:3: Voorwaar, in de hemelen en op aarde zijn tekenen voor de gelovigen.
null.verse 45:4: En in de schepping van uzelf en alle medeschepselen, die Hij verspreidt (over de aarde), zijn tekenen voor een volk dat zekerheid van geloof wil hebben.
null.verse 45:5: En in de wisseling van nacht en dag en de voorziening die God uit de hemel nederzendt waardoor Hij de aarde doet herleven na haar dood en in de verandering van de winden, zijn eveneens tekenen voor een volk, dat zijn verstand gebruikt.
null.verse 45:6: Dit zijn de tekenen van God, die wij naar waarheid aan u voordragen.
null.verse 45:7: Wee elke zondige leugenaar,
null.verse 45:8: Die de woorden van God, die hem worden voorgedragen, hoort en niettemin minachtend ze trotseert alsof hij ze niet hoorde.
null.verse 45:9: En die, wanneer hij van Onze tekenen kennis krijgt er mee spot.
null.verse 45:10: Zij hebben de hel in het vooruitzicht; hetgeen zij verwierven zal hen niet baten noch de afgoden die zij buiten God tot beschermers namen, terwijl zij een grote straf zullen ontvangen.
null.verse 45:11: Dit is de leiding.
null.verse 45:12: God is Hij, Die de zee in uw dienst heeft gesteld, zodat schepen er op varen door Zijn gebod opdat gij naar Zijn overvloed zult zoeken en dat gij dankbaar moogt zjin.
null.verse 45:13: En Hij heeft alles van Hem afkomstig in de hemelen en op aarde aan u onderworpen.
null.verse 45:14: Zeg tegen de gelovigen, dat zij diegenen, die de dagen van God niet vrezen, moeten vergeven, zodat Hij Zelf het volk moge vergelden voor hetgeen zij verrichten.
null.verse 45:15: Wie goed doet, doet dat ten voordele van zijn eigen ziel: en wie kwaad doet, doet dat tegen zijn eigen ziel.
null.verse 45:16: Wij gaven het Boek en de heerschappij en het profetenambt aan de kinderen van Israël en Wij hadden hen van goede dingen voorzien: Wij begunstigden hen boven de andere volkeren.
null.verse 45:17: En Wij gaven hun duidelijke uitleg over de godsdienst.
null.verse 45:18: Dan hebben Wij u (o Mohammed) een duidelijke weg gewezen; volg die daarom, maar volg de begeerten der onwetenden niet.
null.verse 45:19: Voorwaar, zij zullen u niets tegen God baten.
null.verse 45:20: Dit zijn de duidelijke bewijzen voor de mensen en een richtsnoer en barmhartigheid aan een volk dat zekerheid van geloof heeft.
null.verse 45:21: Verbeelden diegenen die slechte daden doen, dat Wij hen zullen behandelen zoals hen, die geloven en goede werken verrichten, zodat hun leven en hun dood gelijk zullen zijn? Verkeerd is hun oordeel.
null.verse 45:22: God heeft de hemelen en de aarde in waarheid geschapen, zo dat elke ziel voor hetgeen zij verdient vergolden moge worden en hun zal geen onrecht worden aangedaan.
null.verse 45:23: Hebt gij hem gezien, die zijn eigen begeerte tot zijn God maakt, en die God liet dwalen, ondanks zijn kennis, en wiens oren en wiens hart Hij heeft verzegeld en op wiens ogen Hij een sluier heeft gelegd? Wie zal hem buiten God kunnen leiden? Wilt gij dan geen lering hieruit trekken?
null.verse 45:25: En wanneer Onze duidelijke woorden aan hen worden voorgedragen, is hun enige tegenwerping: "Brengt onze vaderen terug, als gij de waarheid spreekt.
null.verse 45:26: Zeg: "Het is God, Die u leven geeft en u daarna doet sterven, daarna zal Hij u tezamen verzamelen op de Dag der Opstanding waarover geen twijfel is.
null.verse 45:27: Aan God behoort de heerschappij der hemelen en der aarde; de Dag waarop het Uur aanbreekt, zullen zij die leugens volgen, vergaan.
null.verse 45:28: En gij zult ieder volk zien knielen.
null.verse 45:29: "Dit is Ons Boek: het spreekt tot u; met waarheid.
null.verse 45:30: Maar wat hen betreft, die geloofden en goede daden verrichtten, hun Heer zal hen in Zijn barmhartigheid toelaten.
null.verse 45:31: Maar tot de ongelovigen (zal gezegd worden): "Werden Mijn woorden niet aan u voorgedragen? Doch gij waart hoogmoedig en werdt een schuldig volk.
null.verse 45:32: En toen er werd gezegd: "De belofte van God is zeker waar en aan het Uur is geen twijfel," zeidet gij: "Wij weten niet wat het Uur is: wij vermoeden het slechts en zijn er niet zeker van.
null.verse 45:33: En het boze hunner daden zal hun duidelijk worden en hetgeen zij plachten te bespotten zal hen omringen.
null.verse 45:34: En er zal worden gezegd: "Deze Dag zullen Wij u vergeten zoals gij de ontmoeting met deze Dag vergeten hebt.
null.verse 45:35: "Dit is omdat gij de tekenen van God bespottet, daardoor heeft het leven der wereld u misleid.
null.verse 45:36: Alle lof komt God toe, de Heer der hemelen en der aarde; de Heer der Werelden.
null.verse 45:37: Hem behoort de Grootheid in de hemelen en op aarde: en Hij is de Machtige, de Alwijze.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:2: The revelation of the Scripture is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:3: Lo! in the heavens and the earth are portents for believers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:4: And in your creation, and all the beasts that He scattereth in the earth, are portents for a folk whose faith is sure.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:5: And the difference of night and day and the provision that Allah sendeth down from the sky and thereby quickeneth the earth after her death, and the ordering of the winds, are portents for a people who have sense.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:6: These are the portents of Allah which We recite unto thee (Muhammad) with truth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:8: Who heareth the revelations of Allah recited unto him, and then continueth in pride as though he heard them not.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:9: And when he knoweth aught of Our revelations he maketh it a jest.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:10: Beyond them there is hell, and that which they have earned will naught avail them, nor those whom they have chosen for protecting friends beside Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:12: Allah it is Who hath made the sea of service unto you that the ships may run thereon by His command, and that ye may seek of His bounty, and that haply ye may be thankful;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:13: And hath made of service unto you whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth; it is all from Him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:14: Tell those who believe to forgive those who hope not for the days of Allah; in order that He may requite folk what they used to earn.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:15: Whoso doeth right, it is for his soul, and whoso doeth wrong, it is against it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:16: And verily we gave the Children of Israel the Scripture and the Command and the Prophethood, and provided them with good things and favoured them above (all) peoples;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:18: And now have We set thee (O Muhammad) on a clear road of (Our) commandment; so follow it, and follow not the whims of those who know not.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:19: Lo! they can avail thee naught against Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:20: This is clear indication for mankind, and a guidance and a mercy for a folk whose faith is sure.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:21: Or do those who commit ill-deeds suppose that We shall make them as those who believe and do good works, the same in life and death ? Bad is their judgment!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:22: And Allah hath created the heavens and the earth with truth, and that every soul may be repaid what it hath earned.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:23: Hast thou seen him who maketh his desire his god, and Allah sendeth him astray purposely, and sealeth up his hearing and his heart, and setteth on his sight a covering ? Then who will lead him after Allah (hath condemned him) ? Will ye not then heed ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:24: And they say: There is naught but our life of the world; we die and we live, and naught destroyeth us save time; when they have no knowledge whatsoever of (all) that; they do but guess.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:25: And when Our clear revelations are recited unto them their only argument is that they say: Bring (back) our fathers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:26: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Allah giveth life to you, then causeth you to die, then gathereth you unto the Day of Resurrection whereof there is no doubt.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:27: And unto Allah belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; and on the day when the Hour riseth, on that day those who follow falsehood will be lost.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:28: And thou wilt see each nation crouching, each nation summoned to its record.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:29: This Our Book pronounceth against you with truth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:30: Then, as for those who believed and did good works, their Lord will bring them in unto His mercy.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:31: And as for those who disbelieved (it will be said unto them): Were not Our revelations recited unto you ? But ye were scornful and became a guilty folk.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:32: And when it was said: Lo! Allah’s promise is the truth, and there is no doubt of the Hour’s coming, ye said: We know not what the Hour is.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:33: And the evils of what they did will appear unto them, and that which they used to deride will befall them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:34: And it will be said: This day We forget you, even as ye forgot the meeting of this your day; and your habitation is the Fire, and there is none to help you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:35: This, forasmuch as ye made the revelations of Allah a jest, and the life of the world beguiled you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:36: Then praise be to Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, the Lord of the Worlds.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 45:37: And unto Him (alone) belongeth Majesty in the heavens and the earth, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:2: The revelation of the Book is from God the Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:3: Verily in the heavens and the earth, are Signs for those who believe.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:4: And in the creation of yourselves and the fact that animals are scattered (through the earth), are Signs for those of assured Faith.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:5: And in the alternation of Night and Day, and the fact that God sends down Sustenance from the sky, and revives therewith the earth after its death, and in the change of the winds,- are Signs for those that are wise.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:6: Such are the Signs of God, which We rehearse to thee in Truth; then in what exposition will they believe after (rejecting) God and His Signs?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:7: Woe to each sinful dealer in Falsehoods:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:8: He hears the Signs of God rehearsed to him, yet is obstinate and lofty, as if he had not heard them: then announce to him a Penalty Grievous!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:9: And when he learns something of Our Signs, he takes them in jest: for such there will be a humiliating Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:10: In front of them is Hell: and of no profit to them is anything they may have earned, nor any protectors they may have taken to themselves besides God: for them is a tremendous Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:11: This is (true) Guidance and for those who reject the Signs of their Lord, is a grievous Penalty of abomination.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:12: It is God Who has subjected the sea to you, that ships may sail through it by His command, that ye may seek of his Bounty, and that ye may be grateful.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:13: And He has subjected to you, as from Him, all that is in the heavens and on earth: Behold, in that are Signs indeed for those who reflect.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:14: Tell those who believe, to forgive those who do not look forward to the Days of God: It is for Him to recompense (for good or ill) each People according to what they have earned.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:15: If any one does a righteous deed, it ensures to the benefit of his own soul; if he does evil, it works against (his own soul).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:16: We did aforetime grant to the Children of Israel the Book the Power of Command, and Prophethood; We gave them, for Sustenance, things good and pure; and We favoured them above the nations.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:17: And We granted them Clear Signs in affairs (of Religion): it was only after knowledge had been granted to them that they fell into schisms, through insolent envy among themselves.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:18: Then We put thee on the (right) Way of Religion: so follow thou that (Way), and follow not the desires of those who know not.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:19: They will be of no use to thee in the sight of God: it is only Wrong-doers (that stand as) protectors, one to another: but God is the Protector of the Righteous.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:20: These are clear evidences to men and a Guidance and Mercy to those of assured Faith.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:21: What! Do those who seek after evil ways think that We shall hold them equal with those who believe and do righteous deeds,- that equal will be their life and their death? Ill is the judgment that they make.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:22: God created the heavens and the earth for just ends, and in order that each soul may find the recompense of what it has earned, and none of them be wronged.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:23: Then seest thou such a one as takes as his god his own vain desire? God has, knowing (him as such), left him astray, and sealed his hearing and his heart (and understanding), and put a cover on his sight.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:24: And they say: "What is there but our life in this world? We shall die and we live, and nothing but time can destroy us.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:25: And when Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them their argument is nothing but this: They say, "Bring (back) our forefathers, if what ye say is true!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:26: Say: "It is God Who gives you life, then gives you death; then He will gather you together for the Day of Judgment about which there is no doubt": But most men do not understand.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:27: To God belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and the Day that the Hour of Judgment is established,- that Day will the dealers in Falsehood perish!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:28: And thou wilt see every sect bowing the knee: Every sect will be called to its Record: "This Day shall ye be recompensed for all that ye did!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:29: "This Our Record speaks about you with truth: For We were wont to put on Record all that ye did.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:30: Then, as to those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them to His Mercy that will be the achievement for all to see.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:31: But as to those who rejected God, (to them will be said): "Were not Our Signs rehearsed to you? But ye were arrogant, and were a people given to sin!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:32: "And when it was said that the promise of God was true, and that the Hour- there was no doubt about its (coming), ye used to say, ’We know not what is the hour: we only think it is an idea, and we have no firm assurance.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:33: Then will appear to them the evil (fruits) of what they did, and they will be completely encircled by that which they used to mock at!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:34: It will also be said: "This Day We will forget you as ye forgot the meeting of this Day of yours! and your abode is the Fire, and no helpers have ye!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:35: "This, because ye used to take the Signs of God in jest, and the life of the world deceived you:" (From) that Day, therefore, they shall not be taken out thence, nor shall they be received into Grace.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:36: Then Praise be to God, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth,- Lord and Cherisher of all the Worlds!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 45:37: To Him be glory throughout the heavens and the earth: and He is Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom!

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:2: The sending down of the Book is from God, the All-mighty, the All-wise.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:3: Surely in the heavens and earth there are signs for the believers;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:4: and in your creation, and the crawling things He scatters abroad, there are signs for a people having sure faith,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:5: and in the alternation of night and day, and the provision God sends down from heaven, and therewith revives the earth after it is dead, and the turning about of the winds, there are signs for a people who understand.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:6: Those are the signs of God that We recite to thee in truth; in what manner of discourse then, after God and His signs, will they believe?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:8: who hears the signs of God being recited to him, then perseveres in waxing proud, as if he has not heard them; so give him the good tidings of a painful chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:9: And when he knows anything of Our signs, he takes them in mockery; those for them awaits a humbling chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:10: Behind them Gehenna; and that they have earned shall not avail them aught, nor those they took as protectors, apart from God; for them awaits a mighty chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:11: This is guidance; and those who disbelieve in the signs of their Lord, there awaits them a painful chastisement of wrath.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:12: God is He who has subjected to you the sea, that the ships may run on it at His commandment, and that you may seek His bounty; haply so you will be thankful.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:13: And He has subjected to you what is in the heavens and what is in the earth, all together, from Him.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:14: Say unto those who believe, that they forgive those who do not look for the days of God, that He may recompense a people for that they have been earning.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:15: Whoso does righteousness, it is to his own gain, and whoso does evil, it is to his own loss; then to your Lord you shall be returned.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:16: Indeed, We gave the Children of Israel the Book, the Judgment, and the Prophethood, and We provided them with good things, and We preferred them above all beings.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:17: We gave them clear signs of the Command; so they differed not, except after the knowledge had come to them, being insolent one to another.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:18: Then We set thee upon an open way of the Command; therefore follow it, and follow not the caprices of those who do not know.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:19: Surely they will not avail thee aught against God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:20: This is clear proofs for men, and a guidance, and a mercy to a people having sure faith.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:21: Or do those who commit evil deeds think that We shall make them as those who believe and do righteous deeds, equal their living and their dying? How ill they judge!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:22: God created the heavens and the earth in truth, and that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned; they shall not be wronged.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:23: Hast thou seen him who has taken his caprice to be his god, and God has led him astray out of a knowledge, and set a seal upon his hearing and his heart, and laid a covering on his eyes? Who shall guide him after God? What, will you not remember?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:24: They say, ’There is nothing but our present life; we die, and we live, and nothing but Time destroys us.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:25: And when Our signs are recited to them, clear signs, their only argument is that they say, ’Bring us our fathers, if you speak truly.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:26: Say: ’God gives you life, then makes you die, then He shall gather you to the Day of Resurrection, wherein is no doubt, but most men do not know.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:27: And unto Allah belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; and on the day when the Hour riseth, on that day those who follow falsehood will be lost.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:28: And thou shalt see every nation hobbling on their knees, every nation being summoned unto its Book: ’Today you shall be recompensed for that you were doing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:29: This is Our Book, that speaks against you the truth; We have been registering all that you were doing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:30: And as for those who have believed and done deeds of righteousness, their Lord shall admit them into His mercy; that is the manifest triumph.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:31: But as for those who have disbelieved: ’Were not My signs recited to you, and you waxed proud, and were a sinful people?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:32: And when it was said, "God’s promise is true, and the Hour, there is no doubt of it," you said; "We know not what the Hour may be; we have only a surmise, and are by no means certain.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:33: And the evil deeds that they have done shall appear to them, and they shall be encompassed by that they mocked at.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:34: And it shall be said, ’Today We do forget you, even as you forgot the encounter of this your day; and your refuge is the Fire, and you shall have no helpers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:35: That is for that you took God’s signs in mockery, and the present life deluded you.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:36: So to God belongs praise, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, Lord of all Being.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 45:37: His is the Domination an the heavens and the earth; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Muhammad Asad.verse 45:2: THE BESTOWAL from on high of this divine writ issues from God, the Almighty, the Wise.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:3: Behold, in the heavens as well as on earth there are indeed messages for all who [are willing to] believe.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:4: And in your own nature, and in [that of] all the animals which He scatters [over the earth] there are messages for people who are endowed with inner certainty.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:5: And in the succession of night and day, and in the means of subsistence which God sends down from the skies, giving life thereby to the earth after it had been lifeless, and in the change of the winds: [in all this] there are messages for people who use their reason.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:6: These messages of God do We convey unto thee, setting forth the truth.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:8: who hears God’s messages when they are conveyed to him, and yet, as though he had not heard them, persists in his haughty disdain! Hence, announce unto him grievous suffering –
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:9: for when he does become aware of any of Our messages, he makes them a target of his mockery! For all such there is shameful suffering in store.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:10: Hell is ahead of them; and all that they may have gained [in this world] shall be of no avail whatever to them, and neither shall any of those things which, instead of God, they have come to regard as their protectors: for awesome suffering awaits them.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:11: [To pay heed to God’s signs and messages:] this is [the meaning of] guidance; on the other hand, for those who are bent on denying the truth of their Sustainer’s messages there is grievous suffering in store as an outcome of
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:13: IT IS GOD who has made the sea subservient [to His laws, so that it be of use] to you – so that ships might sail through it at His behest, and that you might seek to obtain [what you need] of His bounty, and that you might have cause to be grateful.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:14: And He has made subservient to you, [as a gift] from Himself, all that is in the heavens and on earth: in this, behold, there are messages indeed for people who think!
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:15: Tell all who have attained to faith that they should forgive those who do not believe in the coming of the Days of God, [since it is] for Him
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:16: to requite people for whatever they may have earned.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:17: Whoever does what is just and right, does so for his own good; and whoever does evil, does so to his own hurt; and in the end unto your Sustainer you all will be brought back.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:19: unto the children of Israel did We vouchsafe revelation, and wisdom, and prophethood; and We provided for them sustenance out of the good things of life, and favoured them above all other people [of their time].
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:20: And We gave them clear indications of the purpose [of faith]; and it was only after all this knowledge had been vouchsafed to them that they began, out of mutual jealousy, to hold divergent views:
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:21: verily, thy Sustainer will judge between them on Resurrection Day regarding all whereon they were wont to differ.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:22: And, finally, [O Muhammad,] We have set thee on a way by which the purpose [of faith] may be fulfilled: so follow thou this ,
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:23: and follow not the likes and dislikes of those who do not know [the truth].
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:24: Behold, they could never be of any avail to thee if thou wert to defy the will of God – for, verily, such evildoers are but friends and protectors of one another, whereas God is the Protector of all who are conscious of Him.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:25: This [revelation, then,] is a means of insight for mankind, and a guidance and grace unto people who are endowed with inner certainty.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:26: Now as for those who indulge in sinful doings – do they think that We place them, both in their life and their death, on an equal footing with those who have attained to faith and do righteous deeds? Bad, indeed, is their judgment:
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:27: for God has created the heavens and the earth in accordance with [an inner] truth, and [has therefore willed] that every human being shall be recompensed for what he has earned and none shall be wronged.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:28: HAST THOU ever considered [the kind of man] who makes his own desires his deity, and whom God has
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:29: let go astray, knowing [that his mind is closed to all guidance], and whose hearing and heart He has sealed, and upon whose sight He has placed a veil? Who, then, could guide him after God [has abandoned him]? Will you not, then, bethink yourselves?
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:30: And yet they say: "There is nothing beyond our life in this world.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:32: whenever Our messages are conveyed to them in all their clarity, their only argument is this: "Bring forth our forefathers [as witnesses], if what you claim is true!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:33: Say: "It is God who gives you life, and then causes you to die; and in the end He will gather you together on Resurrection Day, [the coming of] which is beyond all doubt – but most human beings understand it not.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:34: For God’s is the dominion over the heavens and the earth; and on the Day when the Last Hour dawns – on that Day will be lost all who [in their lifetime] tried to reduce to nothing [whatever they could not understand].
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:35: And [on that Day] thou wilt see all people kneeling down [in humility]: all people will be called upon to
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:36: their record: "Today you shall be requited for all that you ever did!
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:37: This Our record speaks of you in all truth: for, verily, We have caused to be recorded all that you ever did!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:38: Now as for those who have attained to faith and done righteous deeds, their Sustainer will admit them to His grace: that, that will be
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:40: But as for those who were bent on denying the truth, [they will be told:] "Were not My messages conveyed to you? And withal, you gloried in your arrogance, and so you became people lost in sin:
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:41: for when it was said, ‘Behold, God’s promise always comes true, and there can be no doubt about [the coming of] the Last Hour’ – you would answer, ‘We do not know what that Last Hour may be: we think it is no more than an empty guess, and
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:42: we are by no means convinced!’"
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:43: And [on that Day,] the evil of their doings will become obvious to them, and they will be overwhelmed by the very thing which they were wont to deride.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:44: And [the word] will be spoken: "Today We shall be oblivious of you as you were oblivious of the coming of this your Day [of Judgment]; and so your goal is the fire, and you shall have none to succour you:
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:45: this, because you made God’s messages the target of your mockery, having allowed the life of this world to beguile you!" On that Day, therefore, they will not be brought out of the fire, nor will they be allowed to make amends.
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:46: AND THUS, all praise is due to God, Sustainer of the heavens and Sustainer of the earth: the Sustainer of all the worlds!
Muhammad Asad.verse 45:47: And His alone is all majesty in the heavens and on earth; and He alone is almighty, truly wise!

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:2: This is revelation of the Book from Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:3: Surely in the heavens and the earth, there are signs for those who have faith.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:4: And in your creation and in the living beings that He scatters on the earth, there are signs for a people who believe.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:5: And in the alternation of the day and the night, and in the provision He has sent down from the sky, then has revived the earth after its death, and in changing of the winds, there are signs for a people who understand.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:6: These are Allah’s verses that We recite to you rightly.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:8: who hears Allah’s verses being recited to him, then he remains adamant out of arrogance, as if he never heard them.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:9: When he learns about something of Our verses, he takes it as a laughing stock.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:10: In front of them, there is Jahannam (Hell).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:11: This is guidance, and those who reject the verses of their Lord, for them there is a painful punishment of the divine scourge.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:12: Allah is the One who has subjugated for you the sea, so that the ships may sail in it with His command, and so that you may seek His grace, and so that you offer gratitude.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:13: He has subjugated for you whatever there is in the heavens and whatever there is in the earth, all on His own.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:14: Tell those who believe that they should forgive those who do not believe in Allah’s days, so that He may recompense a people for what they used to earn.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:15: Whoever acts righteously, it is for his own benefit, and who does evil, it is against his own soul.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:16: We gave the children of Isrā’īl the book and the wisdom and the prophet-hood, and provided them with good things, and preferred them above all (people of) the world,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:17: and We gave them clear proofs of the Matter (i.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:18: Then We have put you on a certain way of the Matter (i.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:19: They will never help you against Allah in the least.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:20: These are insights for the people, and guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:21: Do those who have committed evils assume that We will make them like those who believe and do righteous deeds, so as their life and death becomes equal? Evil is what they judge.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:22: Allah has created the heavens and the earth with just purpose, and so that everybody is recompensed for what he (or she) earned, and they will not be wronged.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:23: So, have you seen him who has taken his desires as his god, and Allah has let him go astray, despite having knowledge, and has sealed his ear and his heart, and put a cover on his eye? Now who will guide him after Allah? Still, do you not take lesson?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:24: And they say, “There is no life but our worldly life.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:25: When Our verses are recited to them in all their clarity, their argument is none but that they say, “Bring our fathers, if you are truthful.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:26: Say, “Allah gives you life, then makes you die, then He will assemble you on the Day of Judgement in which there is no doubt, but most of the people do not know.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:27: To Allah belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:28: and you will see every community kneeling down.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:29: This is Our book that speaks against you with truth.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:30: Then, as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them to His mercy.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:31: And as to those who disbelieved, (it will be said to them,) “Had My verses not been recited to you? But you showed arrogance, and you were a guilty people;
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:32: and when it was said to you that Allah’s promise is true and there is no doubt in the (arrival of the) Hour, you used to say, ‘We do not know what the Hour is.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:33: And revealed to them will be the evils of what they did, and encircled they will be by what they used to ridicule.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:34: It will be said, “Today We will forget you, as you forgot facing this your day, and your abode is the Fire, and for you there are no helpers at all.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:35: That is because you took Allah’s verses as a laughing stock, and the worldly life deceived you.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:36: So, to Allah belongs all praise, who is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of the worlds.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 45:37: And to Him belongs majesty in the heavens and the earth.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:2: The revelation of the Book is from God, the Mighty, the Wise.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:3: Truly in the heavens and the earth there are signs for believers.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:4: And in your creation, and what He has scattered of animals, there are signs for a people who are certain;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:5: and the alternation of night and day, and what God sends down from the heaven [in the way] of provision with which He revives the earth after it is dead, and the circulation of the winds, there are signs for a people who understand.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:6: These are the signs of God which We recite to you with truth.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:8: who hears the signs of God being recited to him, then persists arrogantly, as if he had not heard them.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:9: And should he come to know anything of Our signs, he takes them in mockery.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:10: Beyond them is Hell, and that which they have earned will not avail them in any way, nor those whom they took besides God as patrons.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:11: This is a guidance, and those who disbelieve in the signs of their Lord, for them there will be a torture of a painful chastisement.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:12: God it is Who disposed for you the sea so that the ships may sail upon it by His command, and that you may seek of His bounty, and that perhaps you may give thanks.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:13: And He has disposed for you whatever is in the heavens, and whatever is in the earth, all being from Him.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:14: Tell those who believe to forgive those who do not anticipate the days of God that He may requite a people for what they used to earn.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:15: Whoever acts righteously, it is for [the benefit of] his own soul, and whoever does evil, it is to the detriment thereof; then to your Lord you will be returned.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:16: And verily We gave the Children of Israel the Scripture, and [the means of] judgement, and prophethood, and We provided them with the good things, and We favoured them above
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:18: And We gave them clear illustrations of the commandment.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:19: Then We set you upon a
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:20: course of the commandment; so follow it, and do not follow the desires of those who do not know.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:21: Assuredly they will not avail you in any way against God.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:23: This is [a set of] insights for mankind, and guidance and mercy for a people who have certainty.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:24: Or do those who have perpetrated evil acts suppose that We shall treat them as those who believe and perform righteous deeds, equally in their life and in their death? How evil is that judgement which they make!
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:25: And God created the heavens and the earth with the truth and so that every soul may be requited for what it has earned, and they will not be wronged.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:26: Have you then seen him who has taken as his god his
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:27: desire, and whom God has led astray knowingly, and set a seal upon his hearing and his heart, and laid a covering over his sight? So who will guide him after God? Will you not then remember?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:28: And they say, ‘There is only our life in this world.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:29: And when Our signs, are recited to them, being clear signs, their only argument is to say, ‘Bring us our fathers, if you are being truthful’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:30: Say: ‘God [is the One Who] gives you life, then makes you die, then gathers you to the Day of Resurrection, in which there is no doubt; but most people do not know’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:31: And to God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:32: And you will see every community.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:33: This is Our book, which pronounces against you with truth.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:34: So as for those who believed and performed righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:35: But as for those who disbelieved: ‘Were not My signs recited to you, but you were disdainful and were a guilty lot?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:36: And when it was said: “God’s promise is indeed true, and there is no doubt about the Hour”, you said, “We do not know what the Hour is.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 45:37: And there will appear before them the evils of what they did, and they will be besieged by what they used to deride.
